info.description: The to-do service sets you up with the most basic workflow for creating and completing tasks.
info.title: To-do Service API

post.description: Creates a new task from a payload

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: task
parameters.description: New task to be created

put.description: Replace the Task specified by the id provided in the URL. The replaced Task will be returned.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Task to replace

parameters.name: taskV1
parameters.description: Task to replace the existing Task

patch.description: Update the Task specified by the id provided in the URL. The updated Task will be returned.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Task to update

parameters.name: patch
parameters.description: JSON Patch to update an existing Task

get.description: Retrieves a page of tasks associated with a customer.

parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: sortField
parameters.description: Value for sorting (not required), 'DUE_DATE' by default

parameters.name: isDescending
parameters.description: Value which sets order for sorting, ASC by default

parameters.name: statuses
parameters.description: Filtering tasks by statuses, can be comma separated list

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: Filtering tasks by types, can be comma separated list

parameters.name: customerName
parameters.description: Filtering tasks by customer name

parameters.name: dueDate
parameters.description: Filtering tasks which were created before this dueDate(including)

parameters.name: assigneeId
parameters.description: Filtering tasks by assignee

parameters.name: hideCced
parameters.description: Filtering tasks where supplied assigneeId is primary

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to include in the response

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of items to retrieve

relatedObjects.description: A map of different kinds of objects related to the response. Each key in the map is a type of object that is referenced from the content of the response, e.g. a User or an Entity. Each value of the map is itself a map, but of the objects' IDs to the objects themselves so as to allow looking each object up via the ID that was provided in the content.

updatedOn.description: When the assignment type was changed

TaskAssigneeV1.description: This model describes a Task Assignee. The assignee is the person responsible for doing the task. A task can have multiple assignees.

contextualIdV1s.description: List of contextual ids of tasks to be updated.

TaskNoteV1.description: This model describes a Task Note. A task can have multiple notes created by assignee(s).

updatedOn.description: When the task was last updated.

customerId.description: ID of the customer associated with the tak.

documentIds.description: IDs of the documents associated with the task.

primaryAssigneeId.description: User ID of the primary assignee.

relatedItemId.description: ID of the item related to the task.

relatedItemType.description: Type of item related to the task.

shouldGenerateNotification.description: Notify the primary assignee with an alert. For tasks with URGENT priority, an alert will be sent regardless of the value passed here.

statusChangedBy.description: The ID of the user who has changed the status.

statusChangedOn.description: The date when status was changed.
